DOCNAME: CASE OF SHCHERBININ AND ZHARIKOV v. UKRAINE
CONCLUSION: Violation of Art 6-1;Violation of P1-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and Expenses - claim dismissed
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE and DATE respectively and live in PERSON , the GPE region . They are former employees of ORG ( “ the Mine , ” ДП шахта LOC ” ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE , CARDINAL and DATE ORG ( Краснолуцький міський суд PERSON області ) ordered the Mine to pay ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL , ORG DATE and ORG CARDINAL respectively in salary arrears and various payments to the first applicant .
CARDINAL . On CARDINAL and DATE ORG ordered the Mine to pay ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL and ORG DATE , respectively , in salary arrears and various payments to the second applicant .
CARDINAL . All of the above judgments became final and the enforcement writs were transferred to ORG ( “ the Bailiffs , ” PERSON виконавчої служби ORG міського управління юстиції ) for enforcement .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( “ ORG , ” Господарський суд PERSON області ) initiated bankruptcy proceedings against the Mine and introduced a moratorium on payment of its debts .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG declared the Mine bankrupt and ordered its rehabilitation , which was to be completed by DATE .

CARDINAL . In DATE the first applicant received the debts due to him by the judgments of DATE and DATE . As regards the debt due to him by the judgment of DATE the first applicant received it in several instalments , the last payment being made on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the second applicant received the debt due to him by the judgment of DATE . The debt due to him by the judgment of CARDINAL DATE was paid to him in several instalments , the final one being made on CARDINAL DATE .
CARDINAL . NORP The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
